definition: concerned with phenomena (especially language) at a particular period without considering historical antecedents
details:
adjective
- concerned with phenomena (especially language) at a particular period without considering historical antecedents
= example: concerned with phenomena (especially language) at a particular period without considering historical antecedents
- occurring or existing at the same time or having the same period or phase
= synonyms: synchronous, synchronal
- occurring taxonomically in the same period of geological time
= example: occurring taxonomically in the same period of geological time
